channel.title: Images in sigs?
channel.description:
How come we can't have images in our signatures?
Obviously big ones look shit, waste space and increase load time - but I think it'd be a good idea to just enable small images.
Like what niggerlocus do, but like 500px wide and 50px high max, and only one image per sig.

item.description:

at least i didn’t make a poll for a poll for a poll

item.title: Images in sigs?
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Do you know in most browsers you can press esc to stop all animated gifs on a page.

Ty, that’ll come in handy =)

Read full topic

item.title: Images in sigs?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

the bank:

It stops the loading of the page, hence stopping the loading of each frame of the GIF. Try clicking to any topic here and press Esc right after, it will cancel the loading.

Didn’t know that, but if you wait for the page to finish loading and then hit ‘esc’ it will also stop animated gifs. On the topic of animated gifs, I think it may be appropriate to post a poll.

Read full topic

item.title: Images in sigs?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:62, topic:337756”][quote author=Zoss link=topic=434157.msg3196095#msg3196095 date=1272812803]

Userbars are fucking shit, gtfo idiots. Rolling heads are the future, get used to it

No offense, but they are incredibly annoying. After not checking the forums for a few months, coming back and looking at a few threads…trying to read the text while having this motion in my field of vision; distracting me.
[/quote]

Do you know in most browsers you can press esc to stop all animated gifs on a page.[/quote]
It worked. :o

Read full topic

item.title: Images in sigs?
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

Speljohan:

Userbars are fucking shit, gtfo idiots. Rolling heads are the future, get used to it

No offense, but they are incredibly annoying. After not checking the forums for a few months, coming back and looking at a few threads…trying to read the text while having this motion in my field of vision; distracting me.

On-topic:

Moparisthebest:

It still makes forums look unprofessional and would be a nightmare for moderation. We have never allowed images in signatures, and I don’t plan on ever doing so in the future.

Mopar is right, there is nothing to argue against this.

Read full topic

item.title: Images in sigs?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:20, topic:337756”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=434157.msg3189171#msg3189171 date=1272076252]
wheres my spinning/love hed
[/quote]
Someone’s jealous. Oh, wait, jealousy has already been brought up!

Seriously, it’s not my fault that not everyone has a head as awesome as mine to the point that someone would want to make a spinning avatar of it. :rolleyes:[/quote]

Generally awesome heads have a full head of hair and aren’t going bald at 20…

Meanwhile, what we have now is fine. There is no need for pictures in signatures.

Read full topic

item.title: Images in sigs?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:46, topic:337756”]If they are allowed, there better be the ability to disable them. (I don’t know SMF well, maybe it’s already there)

EDIT: Though there is a problem there in that every staff member I know will probably disable them, so I’m not sure who would moderate them.[/quote]

That would be a problem, I would like to disable them but, as you said, then who would enforce. I still think it’s just a problem we don’t need.

Read full topic

item.title: Images in sigs?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:46, topic:337756”]If they are allowed, there better be the ability to disable them. (I don’t know SMF well, maybe it’s already there)

EDIT: Though there is a problem there in that every staff member I know will probably disable them, so I’m not sure who would moderate them.[/quote]
i’ve never seen that functionality on smf, at least not in beta release 3. if manually writing the code is a waste of time for mopar, i’m sure i or someone else could write our own mod for it.

also, what malicious use could someone possibly have with 350x19 pixels?

Read full topic
